CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system , the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system has higher EQE values of 30-40 % in the range of 450-850 nm , which contributes to the improvement of I SC from 11.31 to 14.87 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
2. PCBM
3. PC 70 BM

So, the three material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
2. PCBM
3. PC 70 BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph after removing irrelevant entities:

1. PCBM
2. PC 70 BM

So, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PCBM
2. PC 70 BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCBM |
| PC 70 BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system , the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system has higher EQE values of 30-40 % in the range of 450-850 nm , which contributes to the improvement of I SC from 11.31 to 14.87 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. EQE (External Quantum Efficiency)
2. ISC (Short-Circuit Current Density)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. EQE (External Quantum Efficiency)
2. PCBM (Poly(carbazole-based material))
3. DTDPP(Bu) (Ditolyl-substituted poly(phenylene-based material))
4. PC 70 BM (Poly(carbazole-based material) with a molecular weight of 70 kg/mol)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities in the "Property Name" column:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| EQE |
| PCBM |
| DTDPP(Bu) |
| PC 70 BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM system , the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PC 70 BM system has higher EQE values of 30-40 % in the range of 450-850 nm , which contributes to the improvement of I SC from 11.31 to 14.87 mA / cm^2.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. EQE (External Quantum Efficiency) - 30-40 %
2. ISC (Short-Circuit Current) - 11.31 and 14.87 mA / cm^2
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

1. EQE (External Quantum Efficiency) - 30-40 %
2. ISC (Short-Circuit Current) - 11.31 and 14.87 mA / cm^2

The following entities do not refer to the value of a material property and can be removed:

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) : PCBM
2. PC 70 BM
3. 450-850 nm

The updated list of entities that refer to the value of a material property is:

1. EQE - 30-40 %
2. ISC - 11.31 and 14.87 mA / cm^2

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities presented as a Property Value:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| EQE | 30-40 % |
| ISC | 11.31 mA / cm^2 |
| ISC | 14.87 mA / cm^2 |

Note that ISC appears twice in the table, as it has two different values mentioned in the paragraph.
